newsitem.title: USA: Core in talks about possible sale of firm.
newsitem.headline: Core in talks about possible sale of firm.

text.p: Core Industries Inc said Monday it is engaged in discussions with a third party related to the possible sale of Core.

No agreement has been reached and there can be no assurance that any transaction will occur, it added. Core makes specialty products for the fluid controls and construction products; test, measure and control, and farm equipment segments.
Core said it made the statement in response to inquiries concerning recent increases in the price of its common stock. Core shares were up one at 20-3/4, a new 52-week high.
Core did not say if the discussions were in response to an unsolicited offer or if the talks had been initiated by the company.
A company spokesman declined to comment further.
